Uses of Package
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.aop

  • Packages that use com.clarionmedia.infinitum.aop 
    Package Description
    com.clarionmedia.infinitum.aop
    Provides the classes necessary for aspect-oriented programming.
    com.clarionmedia.infinitum.aop.impl
    Provides concrete implementations for the AOP framework.
  • Classes in com.clarionmedia.infinitum.aop used by com.clarionmedia.infinitum.aop 
    Class and Description
    AbstractJoinPoint
    Abstract implementation of JoinPoint.
    AspectDefinition
    Generic aspect definition which stores the information needed to perform AOP.
    AspectDefinition.AdviceDefinition
    Encapsulates a generic aspect advice.
    AspectDefinition.AdviceDefinition.AdviceQualifier
    Used to determine if a Class qualifies for the containing AspectDefinition.AdviceDefinition.
    JoinPoint
    Provides contextual information about a join point.
    JoinPoint.AdviceLocation
    Describes the location of advice relative to the join point.
    JoinPoint.PointcutType
    Describes the type of pointcuts and how it's applied.
    Pointcut
    Contains a set of JoinPoint instances and a Class which the JoinPoints belong to.
    ProceedingJoinPoint
    Provides support for around advice by exposing the ProceedingJoinPoint.proceed() method.
  • Classes in com.clarionmedia.infinitum.aop used by com.clarionmedia.infinitum.aop.impl 
    Class and Description
    AbstractJoinPoint
    Abstract implementation of JoinPoint.
    AdvisedProxyFactory
    Factory for creating advice-woven AbstractProxy instances.
    AspectDefinition
    Generic aspect definition which stores the information needed to perform AOP.
    AspectTransformer
    Provides an API for transforming a non-generic aspect definition, i.e.
    AspectWeaver
    Responsible for generating advice-woven bytecode.
    JoinPoint
    Provides contextual information about a join point.
    JoinPoint.AdviceLocation
    Describes the location of advice relative to the join point.
    JoinPoint.PointcutType
    Describes the type of pointcuts and how it's applied.
    Pointcut
    Contains a set of JoinPoint instances and a Class which the JoinPoints belong to.
    PointcutBuilder
    Provides an API for constructing Pointcut definitions from an AspectDefinition.
    ProceedingJoinPoint
    Provides support for around advice by exposing the ProceedingJoinPoint.proceed() method.
